tasks.name: choose dataset
tasks.description: Search for a dataset from any website like Kaggle with a minimum of 5000 data points

tasks.name: describe dataset and objective
tasks.description: Describe the chosen dataset and the objective of the project

tasks.name: prepare dataset
tasks.description: Prepare the dataset using preprocessing techniques if needed

tasks.name: choose pre-trained model
tasks.description: Choose the most suitable pre-trained model for the problem

tasks.name: implement model from scratch
tasks.description: Implement a deep learning model from scratch

tasks.name: train and test models
tasks.description: Train and test both the pre-trained and implemented models

tasks.name: regularize models
tasks.description: Regularize both models using regularization techniques

tasks.name: evaluate and modify models
tasks.description: Evaluate the models and modify the neural network layers to improve efficiency

tasks.name: create presentation
tasks.description: Create a PPT presentation of the project

rationale: The skills listed are necessary to complete the tasks in the project, which involves data sourcing, preprocessing, and analysis, as well as deep learning model implementation, training, and evaluation. These skills are required to ensure the project is completed successfully and the models are accurate and efficient.
